CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- DefaultPlayer -- 플레이어의 역할을 설정하기 위한 컴포넌트 -- 역할에 따라 UI가 조금 다름 -- 디버그를 위한 Log 패널 기능 있음

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SetRole
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
-- 역할 세팅 함수 local Entity = self.Entity
if Role == "Builder" then self.Role = "Builder" self.Entity:AddComponent("BuilderInput", true) self.Entity.TagComponent:AddTag("builder") self:SetMoneyPanel(true, Entity.Name) elseif Role == "Character" then self.Role = "Character" self.Entity:AddComponent("CharacterInput", true) self.Entity.TagComponent:AddTag("character") elseif Role == "Hybrid" then self.Role = "Hybrid" self.Entity:AddComponent("HybridInput", true) self.Entity.TagComponent:AddTag("hybrid") self:SetMoneyPanel(true, Entity.Name) else log("오류터짐") end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SetMoneyPanel
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- 건축가용 현재 보유 돈 UI local MoneyPanel = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DefaultGroup/Money") MoneyPanel:SetVisible(Enable) MoneyPanel:SetEnable(Enable)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- 테스트용 코드... if Environment:IsMakerPlay() and _UtilLogic:IsNilorEmptyString(self.Role) then --self:SetRole("Hybrid") end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleKeyReleaseEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local key = event.key --------------------------------------------------------
-- 디버깅 로그 창 온오프 if self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer then return end
if key == KeyboardKey.F2 then local log = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DefaultGroup/log")
if log.Visible == false then log:SetVisible(true) log:SetEnable(true) else log:SetVisible(false) log:SetEnable(false) end end
